generalEmotes.label: General emotes ON
generalEmotes.tooltip: Check the checkbox if you want the General Emotes ON

welcomeModule.label: Welcome module ON
welcomeModule.tooltip: Check the checkbox if you want the welcome message module ON

Blacklist.label: Blacklist
Blacklist.tooltip: People prohibited from triggering the emotes messages

breakSeperator.label: The parameter to split multiple messages.
breakSeperator.tooltip: Leave this default, change this to a different 'symbol' if you want to be able to use '|' in your messages.

lineSeperator.label: The parameter for a new line split
lineSeperator.tooltip: Leave this default, change this to a different 'symbol' if you want to be able to use '~' in your messages.

Mode.label: Mode
Mode.tooltip: Set the mode in which the bot repeats emotes. [First emote] Only the first emote gets outputted by the bot. [All emotes, once] Every emote in the list, no duplicates will be outputted by the bot. [All emotes, Mirrored] Outputs the exact amount of emotes in chat. [Randomized] Picks an option from above at random.

Words.label: General emote keywords
Words.tooltip: Emotes/words the bot will respond to, leave a space between each emote/word. Leave blank for none

Cooldown.label: Cooldown (seconds)
Cooldown.tooltip: Set a cooldown, leave blank for none

Permission.label: Permission level for command
Permission.tooltip: Set the permission level for the emotes to trigger

prefixCommand.label: Command to use for editing/adding messages

deleteGreet.label: Command for deleting a welcome message
deleteGreet.tooltip: command for deleting a welcome message

listGreet.label: Command for showing greet list in chat
listGreet.tooltip: command for showing greet list in chat

blacklistedWords.label: Blacklisted words
blacklistedWords.tooltip: words that are blacklisted from welcome messages

testPath.label: Path of the sound file
testPath.tooltip: Insert the path of the soundfile that you want to test

Soundtest.label: Test Sound
Soundtest.tooltip: Click this button to test your sound
